skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: myITforum is the global community for the IT/Dev Connections community which includes IT professionals and developers that work for small, medium and large companies. For over 20 years, myITforum has delivered real-world, community-sourced, technical answers to its members. These answers come in the form of articles, applicable industry news, self-help forum posts, self-help email discussion lists, blog posts, and online media such as videos and podcasts. But the true depth of myITforum.com comes from the wonderfully loyal community that is ever-ready to deliver support 24×7. myITforum offers full-service support for building, encouraging, and supporting User Groups worldwide.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
